job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a GenAI engineer, you will play a crucial role in GenAI projects, contributing significantly to the development of impactful and responsible user-centered products and services. Drawing upon your expertise in both quantitative and qualitative research, you will strategically identify optimal methods to inspire, guide, and formulate the GenAI data architecture-from having a strong knowledge of Gen AI alogorithms to using wide variety of AI/ML techniques to solve business problems. We seek an individual comfortable with uncertainty, possessing excellent communication skills, and showcasing a blend of rigor and creativity when tackling open-ended questions, shaping early ideas, and rigorously testing GenAI solutions.
   * Design and implement Gen AI use cases for major institutions for their business problems.
   * Use visualization tools/modules to be able to explore and analyze outcomes & for Model validation eg: using Power BI / Tableau
   * Build CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment
job_details.full_text:
Gen AI Engineer

As a GenAI engineer, you will play a crucial role in GenAI projects, contributing significantly to the development of impactful and responsible user-centered products and services. Drawing upon your expertise in both quantitative and qualitative research, you will strategically identify optimal methods to inspire, guide, and formulate the GenAI data architecture-from having a strong knowledge of Gen AI alogorithms to using wide variety of AI/ML techniques to solve business problems. We seek an individual comfortable with uncertainty, possessing excellent communication skills, and showcasing a blend of rigor and creativity when tackling open-ended questions, shaping early ideas, and rigorously testing GenAI solutions.
   * Design and implement Gen AI use cases for major institutions for their business problems.
   * Use visualization tools/modules to be able to explore and analyze outcomes & for Model validation eg: using Power BI / Tableau
   * Build CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes designing and implementing GenAI use cases, identifying optimal methods for GenAI data architecture, and applying AI/ML techniques to solve business problems. It explicitly mentions 'GenAI Engineer' in the title and discusses user-centered products and services, RAG systems (implied by 'GenAI data architecture'), and fine-tuning (implied by 'formulate the GenAI data architecture'). The core responsibilities align with developing and deploying generative AI solutions, making 'GenAI Engineer' the most fitting profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'having a strong knowledge of Gen AI alogorithms to using wide variety of AI/ML techniques to solve business problems' directly refers to the creation and application of AI/ML models.
job_tasks.phrase: having a strong knowledge of Gen AI alogorithms to using wide variety of AI/ML techniques to solve business problems

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design and implement Gen AI use cases for major institutions for their business problems' indicates the development and deployment of AI solutions into practical applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement Gen AI use cases for major institutions for their business problems

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Build CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment' is a direct reference to MLOps practices for deploying models.
job_tasks.phrase: Build CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'solve business problems' indicates an understanding of how to apply technical solutions to business needs.
